name: Game Room | Walk to Food and Beverage
externalListingName: Game Room | Walk to Food and Beverage
description:
Welcome to your ultimate home away from home! Fire up some friendly competition in the game room/arcade, relax on the deck, and unwind in thoughtfully designed spaces. With one-step entry and a first-floor bedroom and bath, accessibility is a breeze. Centrally located near restaurants and bars, many within walking distance. Explore nearby attractions like the mall, zoo, parks, museums, colleges, and sports venues—all just a 5-minute drive away.

What You’ll Love About This Property:

🎮 Epic Game Room – Dual racing cabinets with hundreds of games and a multicade with 70K+ titles. Pop-A-Shot, air hockey, darts, and more for endless fun.
🍻 Walk to Food & Drink – Just steps from popular bars and restaurants. No need to drive!
🌳 Outdoor Spaces – Deck with a dining set, grill, and fire pit in warmer months—perfect for relaxing or gathering.
👑 King Bed & Crib in the Primary Bedroom – Spacious, stylish, and made for ultimate comfort.
🏠 Open Concept Living – Large, connected rooms for easy socializing and a welcoming atmosphere.
🪑 Ample Seating for Everyone – Unlike other Airbnbs, we provide seating for every guest in our dining and living areas. No one’s left standing here!
🛏 First-Floor Bed & Bath – Convenient and ideal for those wanting easy access.
🚪 1-Step Entry – Simple entry with no stairs to worry about.
🏠 Completely Renovated – Remodeled in 2020/2021 with a full refurnishing in 2025.
✨ Professionally Designed – Thoughtfully curated spaces blending vintage charm and modern style.
🧺 Brand-New Laundry Room (2025) – Dual washers and dryers keep your stay fresh and easy.

Located in the vibrant Tipperary Hill neighborhood, our home provides easy access to the best of Syracuse. Walk to local bars, restaurants, and coffee shops, or take a short drive to explore museums, parks, and the famous Destiny USA shopping mall. Syracuse University and Upstate University Hospital are also nearby, making this an ideal spot for visiting families, students, and professionals.  

Our home offers the quintessential city experience, with restaurants, bars, and attractions just a few steps away. Embrace the energy of an urban environment—nearby neighbors and the bustle of city life are part of the charm. If you prefer a quieter suburban vibe, this may not be the best fit.  

Welcome to your perfect home away from home—a thoughtfully designed retreat that blends historic charm with modern comfort. This 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom house was remodeled in 2020/2021 and fully refurnished in 2025 to meet the needs of today’s travelers.  

Living Spaces
The first floor boasts high ceilings and updated trim that respects the home’s history while creating a fresh, modern look. The open layout between the living and dining rooms keeps everyone connected—ideal for shared meals, relaxation, or game nights. Ample seating and a 55" TV on an adjustable mount ensure every spot is the best seat in the house.  

Kitchen & Dining
The fully equipped kitchen has everything you need for quick breakfasts or full-course meals. Just steps away, the dining room comfortably seats 8—a rarity in most short-term rentals.  

Bedrooms & Bathrooms
- First Floor: One bedroom and a full bathroom are conveniently located on the main level—perfect for those who prefer to avoid stairs.  
- Second Floor: Three additional bedrooms and another full bathroom, including a converted attic space (on the same level), provide stylish, comfortable retreats with blackout curtains and bedside sconces.  

Game Room & Outdoor Space
The game room is packed with fun: arcade cabinets (70K+ titles), dual racing cabinets, Pop-A-Shot, air hockey, and darts. With dedicated spaces for both kids and adults, everyone can find their favorite way to unwind.  Step onto the back deck, where you’ll find a dining set, grill, and fire pit—perfect for outdoor meals and gathering around in warmer months.

--

The attic, basement, and garage are no access areas.
Please enjoy all other areas of the home!

Check-in:     3pm
Check-out: 11am

--

Largely settled by immigrants from Ireland, the Tipperary Hill Neighborhood proudly showcases its Irish roots still to this day. Located on the West Side of the city of Syracuse, Tipp Hill is home to a number of Irish pubs, restaurants, and bars. This district is loaded with history, parks, festivals and the city's own Rosamond Gifford Zoo. 

If you happen to be in the area around the month of March, Tipp Hill knows how to celebrate St. Patrick's Day. Green Beer Sunday kicks off the festivities traditionally on the last Sunday of February at Coleman's Authentic Irish Pub. And, for those searching for fitness and fun there’s the annual Shamrock 4-mile run that also celebrates the beautiful hilly landscape of the area.

--

Guest interaction:
I am here for you during your stay, but our level of interaction is up to you.  I am only a phone call or message away.  You will be able to self-check-in upon arrival.

Other things to note:
Before you book your stay or while you here feel free to check with us about any special request / needs you might have, and we will do our best to accommodate.

Please remember that you’re staying in a house, not a hotel.  Please treat the space with respect.  If any problems arise, we will do our best to act ASAP, but there is no one living on-site 24/7.

Sorry but we do not give refunds due to weather or natural disasters.

houseRules:
All guests are required to sign a rental agreement, present a valid driver's license, and provide a selfie for identity verification. Access will only be granted once these requirements are fulfilled. The agreement includes the house rules listed below and clearly outlines specific Airbnb terms upon booking acceptance. Feel free to request the document before confirming your booking.

The primary guest responsible for the reservation must be at least 25 years old. Exceptions may be granted at the sole discretion of the hosts on a case-by-case basis.

Local bookings—defined as guests residing in the same city or county as the property—are allowed; however, guests must provide justification for their stay, and approval is at the discretion of the hosts.

Please be aware that guests staying for 30 days or longer are considered legal tenants per the laws of New York State. In some cases, the host may conduct additional screening and/or request the guest to sign a lease.

The host reserves the right to have the guest cancel with Airbnb, with no financial cost or repercussion to the hosts, in the event guests fail to comply.

**HOUSE RULES:**

- No parties allowed
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises
- No smoking
- Pet waste must be taken care of
- Please respect check-in (3pm) and check-out (11am) times
- Please do not cut on the butcher block countertops; use cutting boards
- Take out the trash/recyclables when full. Front of the garage.

name: Thoughtfully Designed and Fully Equipped
description:
Nestled in Syracuse's safe and sought-after Tipperary Hill, this beautifully restored 1900 house combines old-world charm with modern comforts. Ideal for adults, friends, contractors, and business travelers, it's minutes from all destinations, including SU and all hospitals. A short walk to many food and beverage spots. Enjoy this charming sanctuary with upscale design, a cozy enclosed porch, deck, fireplace, elegant bedrooms, dedicated office/laundry, and a gourmet kitchen. Your ideal retreat.

It's important to note that, like many older homes, there may be some noise transfer between apartments, and you might occasionally encounter creaky or slightly uneven floors in certain areas. If these factors are a concern, we recommend considering alternative accommodation options. Guests are kindly requested to review and accept the house rules.

-

Upon entering this exquisite downstairs apartment, you'll discover a cozy living room featuring a large, comfortable couch and two swivel chairs surrounding the spacious coffee table. These chairs are perfect for participating in conversations throughout the apartment. The TV is adjustable, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience from any spot within the room. An electric fireplace, nestled beneath the TV, allows you to create a warm and inviting ambiance during colder months with customizable settings, including various color options.

In warmer seasons, step from the living room into the charming enclosed porch. This area is perfect for savoring your morning coffee while watching the sunrise or capturing the sunset. You can open the storm windows during a thunderstorm or enjoy a refreshing breeze. The space includes a comfortable patio set, providing an ideal spot for relaxation.

Off the living room, you'll find the extra-large main bedroom, featuring a king-size bed for the utmost comfort. There's also a beautifully appointed second bedroom with a queen-sized bed. Guests have raved about the luxurious mattress we've provided, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep.  As you recline on the bed, you can gaze up at the elegant ceiling designs, enveloped in an aura of luxury.

The back part of the house encompasses the charming eat-in gourmet kitchen. Off of it, you will find a beautifully appointed bathroom, an office complete with high-speed internet, a dedicated laundry area with a washer and dryer, and our deck with a patio set for outdoor dining, which is shared with the upstairs apartment.

Our gourmet kitchen features stylish butcher block countertops and modern stainless steel appliances. It's fully equipped with everything you need to prepare delicious meals. Unwind with a relaxing soak in the clawfoot tub, complete with a bubble bath. Treat yourself to a glass of wine and experience true relaxation in this beautifully designed space.

The office desk is thoughtfully positioned in the center of the room near a window, offering the ability to stretch your legs, a pleasant view, and ample natural light. For your convenience, we've installed a wall-mounted surge protector near the desk, allowing you to power your devices without the hassle of tangled cords. The office chair is exceptionally comfortable and rests on a rug with a rug protector, providing the freedom to move around without concern for damage to the space.

Parking: Please use the right side of the driveway.
Entrance: Utilize the right-hand door to access the apartment.

Off-Limits Areas:

2nd-floor apartment and porch
Basement

Before booking or during your stay, please feel free to reach out if you have any special requests or specific needs. We'll make every effort to accommodate your requirements.

I'm here to assist you during your stay, but the extent of our interaction is entirely up to your preferences. Whether you prefer a quick phone call or a message, I'm always just a message away. For your convenience, self-check-in is available upon arrival.

Largely settled by immigrants from Ireland, the Tipperary Hill Neighborhood proudly showcases its Irish roots still to this day. houseRules:
All guests are required to sign a rental agreement, present a valid driver's license, and provide a selfie for identity verification. Access will only be granted once these requirements are fulfilled. The agreement includes the house rules listed below and clearly outlines specific Airbnb terms upon booking acceptance. Feel free to request the document before confirming your booking.

The primary guest responsible for the reservation must be at least 25 years old. Exceptions may be granted at the sole discretion of the hosts on a case-by-case basis.

Local bookings—defined as guests residing in the same city or county as the property—are allowed; however, guests must provide justification for their stay, and approval is at the discretion of the hosts.

Please be aware that guests staying for 30 days or longer are considered legal tenants per the laws of New York State. In some cases, the host may conduct additional screening and/or request the guest to sign a lease.

The host reserves the right to have the guest cancel with Airbnb, with no financial cost or repercussion to the hosts, in the event guests fail to comply.

**HOUSE RULES:**

- Please park on the right side of the driveway only
- After entering the front of the building, use the door on the right to access the apartment.
- The basement and upstairs apartment/porch are off limits
- No parties allowed
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises
- No smoking
- Pet waste must be taken care of
- Please respect check-in window (3pm-10pm) and check- out (11am) times
- Please do not cut on the butcher block countertops; use cutting boards
- Take out the trash/recyclables when full. Side or back of property.

As our property is an apartment, it's important to note that some level of noise might be noticeable between units. Please help us keep this to a minimum by adhering to quiet hours (10PM – 8AM) and demonstrating apartment etiquette:

- Please keep noise to a minimum when using the porch late at night, as the upstairs main bedroom is located nearby
- Keep noise levels to a minimum
- No slamming doors
- No stomping or jumping
- No yelling or shouting
- Don’t be heavy footed
- Show respect for shared spaces

houseRules:
All guests are required to sign a rental agreement, present a valid driver's license, and provide a selfie for identity verification. Access will only be granted once these requirements are fulfilled. The agreement includes the house rules listed below and clearly outlines specific Airbnb terms upon booking acceptance. Feel free to request the document before confirming your booking.

The primary guest responsible for the reservation must be at least 25 years old. Exceptions may be granted at the sole discretion of the hosts on a case-by-case basis.

Local bookings—defined as guests residing in the same city or county as the property—are allowed; however, guests must provide justification for their stay, and approval is at the discretion of the hosts.

Please be aware that guests staying for 30 days or longer are considered legal tenants per the laws of New York State. In some cases, the host may conduct additional screening and/or request the guest to sign a lease.

The host reserves the right to have the guest cancel with Airbnb, with no financial cost or repercussion to the hosts, in the event guests fail to comply.

**HOUSE RULES:**

- The attic is off limits
- No parties allowed
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises
- No smoking
- No pets
- Please respect check-in (3pm) and check-out (11am) times
- Please do not cut on the butcher block countertops; use cutting boards
- Take out the trash/recyclables when full. Side or back of property.

airbnbNeighborhoodOverview:
Largely settled by immigrants from Ireland, the Tipperary Hill Neighborhood proudly showcases its Irish roots still to this day. Located on the West Side of the city of Syracuse, Tipp Hill is home to a number of Irish pubs, restaurants, and bars. This district is loaded with history, parks, festivals and the city's own Rosamond Gifford Zoo.

If you happen to be in the area around the month of March, Tipp Hill knows how to celebrate St. Patrick's Day. Green Beer Sunday kicks off the festivities traditionally on the last Sunday of February at Coleman's Authentic Irish Pub. And, for those searching for fitness and fun there’s the annual Shamrock 4-mile run that also celebrates the beautiful hilly landscape of the area.

houseRules:
All guests are required to sign a rental agreement, present a valid driver's license, and provide a selfie for identity verification. Access will only be granted once these requirements are fulfilled. The agreement includes the house rules listed below and clearly outlines specific Airbnb terms upon booking acceptance. Feel free to request the document before confirming your booking.

The primary guest responsible for the reservation must be at least 25 years old. Exceptions may be granted at the sole discretion of the hosts on a case-by-case basis.

Local bookings—defined as guests residing in the same city or county as the property—are allowed; however, guests must provide justification for their stay, and approval is at the discretion of the hosts.

Please be aware that guests staying for 30 days or longer are considered legal tenants per the laws of New York State. In some cases, the host may conduct additional screening and/or request the guest to sign a lease.

The host reserves the right to have the guest cancel with Airbnb, with no financial cost or repercussion to the hosts, in the event guests fail to comply.

**HOUSE RULES:**

- The front hall and back hall leading to the upstairs apartment is off limits.  It is okay to use the back hall to leave out the side door or access the laundry room in the basement
- No parties allowed
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises
- No smoking
- No pets
- Please respect check-in (3pm) and check-out (11am) times
- Please do not cut on the butcher block countertops; use cutting boards
- Take out the trash/recyclables when full. Side or back of property.
address: 316 S Wilbur Ave, Syracuse, NY 13204, USA
publicAddress: 316 South Wilbur Avenue, Syracuse, New York, United States, 13204
airbnbName: June Promo | 2BR w/ Parking, Walk to Zoo + Bars
airbnbSummary: Spacious 2BR flat with single-floor living in Syracuse’s Tipperary Hill. Enjoy an open-concept layout, full kitchen, in-unit laundry, front and back porches, driveway parking for 5–6 cars, and a dedicated work space. The primary bedroom includes a king bed and crib. Steps from bars, restaurants, parks, and the zoo. Centrally located with easy access to the mall, museums, sports venues, and Syracuse University—all within a 5-minute drive. A roomy, well-equipped home base.
airbnbSpace:
What You’ll Love About This Property
⭐ Track Record of 5-Star Stays – This unit is newly listed, but our other 3BR apartment in the same home is a Guest Favourite with 40+ five-star reviews and a perfect 5.0 rating. Check our host profile to explore both—or book them together for even more space.
🍻 Walk to Food & Drink – Just steps from popular bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and local favorites.
🏠 Open Concept, Single-Floor Living – First-floor layout with no interior steps. Connected rooms make socializing easy and comfortable for guests of all ages.
👶 Quiet Rear Bedroom with King Bed, Crib & Porch – A peaceful space with no apartment above and direct outdoor access—ideal for families or light sleepers.
🍽️ Full Kitchen with Full-Size Appliances – Fridge, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, cookware, and essentials.
🧺 In-Unit Laundry – Washer and dryer located off the kitchen for easy use.
💻 Dedicated Work Area – A full desk setup in the second bedroom for remote work or study.
🚗 Driveway Parking for 5–6 Cars – No street parking stress. Room for everyone.
🌿 Front & Rear Porches + Yard – Enjoy outdoor space and a peaceful back porch.
🏠 Completely Renovated – Remodeled in 2023/2024 with updated finishes and fixtures.
✨ Professionally Designed – Thoughtfully curated spaces blending vintage charm and modern comfort.

What You Should Know
🔉 Traditional Duplex Layout – This is the downstairs unit of a classic Syracuse two-family home. You may hear occasional sounds from the upstairs apartment—typical for homes of this style.
📋 Guest Conduct Policy – We enforce house rules that limit the number of upstairs guests and restrict noise in entry areas during quiet hours.
🌆 Lively, Walkable Neighborhood – Located in the heart of Syracuse’s Tipperary Hill, you’ll be steps from bars, restaurants, and attractions. Expect the charm and activity of the city—not a boring suburban neighborhood.
🚪 Thoughtfully Offered as a 2BR – This home was previously a 3-bedroom, but we now offer it as a 2-bedroom to ensure a more restful and comfortable guest experience. The third bedroom will remain closed.

Living Spaces
Enter through the covered wraparound porch into a spacious dining room with high ceilings and original wood trim. The open layout flows into the living room—ideal for meals, relaxing, or catching up with friends and family.

Kitchen & Bathroom
Fully equipped kitchen with full-size appliances, cookware, and essentials. Just off the kitchen, the bathroom features a subway-tiled shower and in-unit washer and dryer.

Bedrooms
This flat includes two fully enclosed bedrooms, each on the same level and thoughtfully designed with blackout curtains, accent walls, quality mattresses, tower fans, and white noise machines for added comfort. One features a king bed, crib, and access to the back porch, while the other includes a dedicated work area with a desk and chair—ideal for remote work or study.
Please note: A third bedroom is closed to ensure a quieter, more comfortable stay and is not included in this listing.
airbnbAccess:
Parking: Rights to the driveway are exclusive to this apartment. It is a single car wide but can fit 3 to 4 vehicles.

Entrance: After ascending the front porch use the door on the right to access the apartment.

Off-Limits Areas:

Hallways leading to the second floor apartment, and that unit itself are off limits. The back hall can be used to exit the building or access the basement laundry room.

Bedrooms

airbnbNeighborhoodOverview:
Largely settled by immigrants from Ireland, the Tipperary Hill Neighborhood proudly showcases its Irish roots still to this day. Located on the West Side of the city of Syracuse, Tipp Hill is home to a number of Irish pubs, restaurants, and bars. This district is loaded with history, parks, festivals and the city's own Rosamond Gifford Zoo.

If you happen to be in the area around the month of March, Tipp Hill knows how to celebrate St. Patrick's Day. Green Beer Sunday kicks off the festivities traditionally on the last Sunday of February at Coleman's Authentic Irish Pub. And, for those searching for fitness and fun there’s the annual Shamrock 4-mile run that also celebrates the beautiful hilly landscape of the area.

Please remember that you’re staying in a house, not a hotel.  Please treat the space with respect.  If any problems arise, we will do our best to act ASAP, but there is no one living on-site 24/7.

Sorry but we do not give refunds due to weather or natural disasters.

What You’ll Love About This Property
🛏️ Sleeps Up to 16 Guests – Six private bedrooms (1 king, 5 queens) plus up to four folding twin beds available upon request—plenty of space for large groups, families, or retreats.
🌆 Lively, Walkable Neighborhood – Located in the heart of Syracuse’s Tipperary Hill, just steps from bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and local favorites. Expect the charm and energy of the city—not a boring suburban neighborhood.
🛏️ Three Bedrooms on Each Floor – Six total bedrooms offer privacy and flexibility for groups. The first-floor layout provides easy, stair-free access for those who prefer everything on one level. The primary bedroom features a king bed, crib, and walkout access to the porch.
🍽️ Two Open-Concept Kitchens, Living Rooms & Dining Areas – One on each floor, fully stocked and designed for cooking, dining, and socializing together.
💻 Two Dedicated Workspaces – A full desk setup on each level makes remote work or trip planning comfortable and convenient.

Living Spaces
Enter through the covered wraparound porch into a spacious downstairs dining room with original wood trim and high ceilings. The open layout flows into the living room and continues into the eat-in kitchen—ideal for meals, relaxing, or catching up with friends and family. Upstairs, the open-concept living room flows into the eat-in kitchen, with elegant lighting, art deco touches, and large windows creating a welcoming hub for socializing and connection.

Kitchen & Bathroom
Each level features a fully stocked kitchen with full-size appliances, cookware, dishware, pantry basics, and a modern sink with integrated accessories. The downstairs kitchen includes a gas stove, while the upstairs kitchen features a quartz-topped dining nook and butcher block prep island with an electric stove. Both kitchens offer direct access to the back porch. Each bathroom includes a subway-tiled shower and sleek vanity. The downstairs bathroom also includes a full-size washer and dryer, while additional machines are available in the basement.

Bedrooms
The home includes six private bedrooms—three on each floor—designed for comfort and privacy. Each room features blackout curtains, accent walls, quality mattresses, area rugs, tower fans, white noise machines, and nightstands with charging ports. The primary bedroom on the first floor includes a king bed, crib, and access to the porch, while all others offer queen beds. Two bedrooms (one on each floor) include dedicated workspaces with a desk and chair—perfect for remote work or study.
